John.3: Contains John 3:16 - 'For God so loved the world' - the most quoted verse in Christianity
John.1: The Word became flesh - Jesus as the eternal Logos and the calling of the first disciples

1 Corinthians.13: The famous 'Love Chapter' - 'Love is patient, love is kind' - essential reading for weddings and Christian living

Psalms.23: The beloved Shepherd Psalm - 'The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want' - comfort in times of trouble
Psalms.91: Psalm of protection - 'He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High' - promises of God's care
Psalms.1: The blessed man - contrasts the righteous and wicked, foundation of wisdom literature
Psalms.139: God's omniscience and omnipresence - 'You have searched me and known me' - intimate knowledge of God

Romans.8: No condemnation in Christ - 'All things work together for good' - assurance of salvation
Romans.3: All have sinned - universal need for salvation and justification by faith
Romans.12: Living sacrifice - practical Christian living and spiritual gifts

Matthew.5: The Beatitudes - 'Blessed are the poor in spirit' - foundation of Christian ethics
Matthew.6: The Lord's Prayer and teachings on worry - 'Give us this day our daily bread'
Matthew.7: Golden Rule and narrow gate - 'Do unto others as you would have them do unto you'

Genesis.1: Creation account - 'In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth'
Genesis.3: The Fall - Adam and Eve's disobedience and the first promise of redemption
Genesis.22: Abraham's ultimate test - the near-sacrifice of Isaac, foreshadowing Christ

Isaiah.53: The Suffering Servant - 'He was wounded for our transgressions' - prophecy of Christ's crucifixion
Isaiah.40: Comfort my people - 'Every valley shall be exalted' - hope and restoration
